nodes.text: Coronation Day was an event celebrated on the planet Alderaan. It was also celebrated by the Alderaanian residents of Level 3204 on the planet Coruscant during the reign of the Galactic Empire, despite the fact many of them rarely visited their homeworld.
Coronation Day was mentioned in "One Thousand Levels Down," a short story written by Alexander Freed and published in Star Wars Insider 151 on July 22, 2014.
